page.title: 17LEISURE _ ADULT CLUBS
page.content: A wide range of social activities for adults is organized.Monday Social is a bingo club with 100 members. Prize bingo is played on the first and last Thursday. The W.I., part of the Humber side Federation, with about 50 members meets monthly. A Ladies Circle, of 30 ladies, meets monthly in the Methodist Chapel.Events include social evenings, talks and outings. W.E.A classes are held during the winter.The Local Hist- ory group have produced two publica- tions on the History of Winteringham. Natural History talks are also given. Afternoon Lectures on local subjects are organized. The pensioners hold a weekly meeting. Games are played and outings organized for the 8o members small whist drives are held on Satur- day evenings. A village football team plays in the local league. Darts and dominoes teams play at the Bay Horse.
